# rolloffFactor

**Instance Property**

A factor that determines the attenuation curve.

## Declaration

```swift
var rolloffFactor: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

A higher value results in a steeper attenuation curve. The default value is `1.0`, and the value must be greater than `0.0`.

This property is relevant for [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationModel/exponential], [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationModel/inverse], and [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationModel/linear].

## Getting and Setting the Attenuation Values

- **maximumDistance**: The distance beyond which the node applies no further attenuation, in meters.
- **referenceDistance**: The minimum distance at which the node applies attenuation, in meters.
